src:
Fuerte choque entre camión de Unidos y urbano deja varios heridos
Entre los heridos por el fuerte choque de ambas unidades fue identificada una mujer embarazada
03 Nov 2019, 19:42 by Rubén Navarro
Mazatlán, Sinaloa.- Un aparatoso accidente se registró la tarde de este domingo frente al monumento al Agua, que se encuentra en la carretera internacional, a pocos metros de esta casa editorial.
Los vehículos involucrados fueron un camión urbano con ruta Cocos Juárez y un autobús Unidos de Sinaloa.


EL DEBATE

El percanse se registró minutos después de las 19:00 horas.
Al lugar llegaron elementos de Bomberos Mazatlán, paramédios de la Cruz Roja, así como Tránsito Municipal y Policía Municipal.


EL DEBATE

Paramédicos y bomberos atendieron a los pasajeros de los vehículos, ya que muchos, además de sufrir leves golpes, tuvieron crisis nerviosa por el accidente vial.
Entre el conteo de los heridos se tiene el caso de una mujer embarazada que tuvo que ser separada para una resvisión ya que declaró sentir dolores en el vientre, producto del choque.






Mazatlán
text:
Strong clash between United and urban truck leaves several injured
Among those injured by the strong shock of both units, a pregnant woman was identified
03 Nov 2019, 19:42 by Rubén Navarro
Mazatlan, Sinaloa.- A spectacular accident was recorded this Sunday afternoon in front of the Water Monument, which is located on the international highway, a few meters from this publishing house.
The vehicles involved were an urban truck with Cocos Juárez route and a United bus from Sinaloa.


THE DEBATE

The percanse was recorded minutes after 19:00.
There were elements of Mazatlan Firefighters, Red Cross paramedics, as well as Municipal Transit and Municipal Police.


THE DEBATE

Paramedics and firefighters treated the passengers of the vehicles, since many, in addition to suffering minor blows, had a nervous breakdown due to the road accident.
Among the count of the injured is the case of a pregnant woman who had to be separated for a revision because she declared to feel pain in the belly, the result of the shock.






Mazatlan
